category.name: av.goal
category.item: Speedy Servicer Bonus
Today's airport challenge is about servicing your own planes. Accept it and you could win a Bonus Star! Place it on your airport and you'll welcome an additional 100 passengers.
You made completing this quest look easy! I tip my hat to you. Collect your Bonus Star.
Send {number} plane(s)
Friendly Servicer Bonus
Today's airport challenge focuses on servicing buddy planes. Accept it and you could win a Bonus Star! Place it on your airport and you'll welcome an additional 100 passengers.
You made completing this quest look easy! I tip my hat to you. Collect your Bonus Star.
Return {number} plane(s)
Speedy Servicer
Today's airport challenge is about servicing your own planes. Accept it and you could win amazing prizes!
You made completing this quest look easy! I tip my hat to you. Enjoy your reward.
Send {number} plane(s)

Today's airport challenge focuses on servicing buddy planes. Accept it and you could win amazing prizes!
You made completing this quest look easy! I tip my hat to you.

Money Maker
You know what makes the world go 'round? Precisely! Today's quest is all about making your cash registers ring off the hook. Accept it and you could win amazing prizes!
You made completing this quest look easy! I tip my hat to you.
Collect {number} AirCoin(s)

Daily Sales
Today's challenge is all about collecting passengers like a champ. Accept it and you could win amazing prizes!
You made completing this quest look easy! I tip my hat to you.
Collect {number} passenger(s)
Daily Sales
Today's challenge is all about collecting passengers like a champ. Accept it and you could win amazing prizes!
You made completing this quest look easy! I tip my hat to you. Here's your reward, you earned it!
Collect {number} passenger(s)
Elephail
Dude! Guess who's going to the zoo on a hot date? This babe says she's got a big surprise for me. Strolling through the animal kingdom, it's sure to be pure animal attraction! All aboard!
Color me surprised! Her son tagged along! And the little punk kept noshing on my peanuts! Good thing I'm no elephant and can forget that awful evening.
Send {number} plane(s)
Service Desert

Heeey...you! Good googly, aren't these passengers annoying? All day long, all I hear is, "There's no TP! No coffee! No service!" Is that so? Well, I'll just have to show them a thing or two, while you take care of the airport.
Let's see what they have to say about that! I haven't wrapped my head around the toilet paper issue, but we shouldn't hear anymore service complaints, thanks to the complimentary tea service!
Return {number} plane(s)
Monet-Air-y

Howdy! Them ol' penny pinchers at the IRS are a-knockin' at my door, I tell ya. If my gal Fiona finds out she married some broke joker, we're gonna be through! Finito! Or the like. Help me! I'll get better, I swear!
Yeehaw! Now that's what I call me a payday! I've never seen so much cash *sniff* But don't worry, money squandring is my specialty. Besides, rainy day funds are for wet blankets.
Collect {number} AirCoin(s)
Daredevil Dames

Heeey...you! This week, we're testing plane protypes with pedals and hand-cranked propellers. Members from the Society for Retired Aviatrices were supposed to go up, but I they might need a little convincing. Get them back or we'll be stuck doing the work ourselves!

Look at 'em soar! Have you ever seen a plane shudder so elegantly above the clouds? Zig... then zag... then DUCK!

Whew. Let's leave the mimosas on the ground next time.
Collect {number} passenger(s)
Spanish Flyer

Spanish babes are hot, hot, hot! A bullfight sounds like just the place to impress. I'm ready to go. My wrinkle-free, red speedo ought to do the trick! Just follow my lead. Casanova? Hah! Just call me casa-supernova!
*Sigh* ...I hate bullfights. I stumbled into the ring to show off for my new chica and... she ran off with another torero! Sad end for a prize bull like me!
Send {number} planes to Europe
Road Trippin'

American babes love a manly man, right? Leather-clad and gleaming with baby oil. Saw it on TV. Nevermind! I've tuned up my old moped and I'm hitting the road. Honk if you love the ladies as much as I do!
Whooaa! Did you hear all that honking? I felt like the king of the road. Everyone was staring... Until I realized the gasoline line from the pump was still attached to my moped. Phew!
Send {number} planes to North America
On the Wrong Foot

Dude! How do you feel about hiking in the Andes? Romantic trails, mountain air, and plenty of peaks to conquer. Time to whip out my hiking pole, head for the hills, and see what I can rustle out of the bushes!

Ah, what a great time! I think I've set a new hiking trend in South America. The girls set out in droves in the opposite direction. They were quick too. I couldn't catch up. Haha... yeah, so fast. They're calling it the "Great Tariq Escape" on the news. I don't get it.
Send {number} planes to South America
Elephail

Shop Owner Challenge
The International Shop Organization ISO has announced a competition for shop owners around the globe. Anyone who manages to sell the requested amount of products today will be rewarded generously.
Congratulations! You beat the challenge and here is your reward. You earned it!
Sell {number} products
